Posts.Content: Hi, My older sister was diagnosed with BC just as i was finishing my treatment in 2007, she had lump removed chemo and radio. I had mastectomy, chemo and radio. I have been clear of BC for 10 years now. Sadly i have been diagnosed with a new primary of lung cancer in October last year. My sister is still clear of any sign of cancer thank god. Rose
Posts.Title: how many people have had sisters who have also had BC
